name: Abyssal Nightstalker
oracle_text: Whenever Abyssal Nightstalker attacks and isn't blocked, defending player discards a card.

rulings.text: An ability that triggers when something “attacks and isn’t blocked” triggers in the declare blockers step after blockers are declared if (1) that creature is attacking and (2) no creatures are declared to block it. It will trigger even if that creature was put onto the battlefield attacking rather than having been declared as an attacker in the declare attackers step.

name: Air Elemental
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: As insubstantial, and as powerful, as the wind that carries it.

name: Alaborn Cavalier
oracle_text: Whenever Alaborn Cavalier attacks, you may tap target creature.
flavor_text:
"Course he ran! I wouldn't want to stare down that barrel, either!"
—Alaborn soldier

name: Alaborn Grenadier
oracle_text: Vigilance
flavor_text:
"Ever proud, ever vigilant."
—Grenadier motto

name: Alaborn Musketeer
oracle_text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text: Muskets gave the Alaborn army an advantage it had long lacked—air defense.

name: Alaborn Trooper
flavor_text:
"I dedicate my body to my country
And my life to my King."
—Alaborn Soldier's Oath

name: Alaborn Veteran
oracle_text: {T}: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

rulings.text: If a turn has multiple combat phases, the ability can only be activated before the beginning of the declare attackers step of the first combat phase in that turn.

name: Alaborn Zealot
oracle_text: When Alaborn Zealot blocks a creature, destroy that creature and Alaborn Zealot.

name: Alluring Scent
oracle_text: All creatures able to block target creature this turn do so.
flavor_text: No earthly armor is protection against this sweetness.

name: Ancient Craving
oracle_text: You draw three cards and you lose 3 life.
flavor_text:
"Knowledge demands sacrifice."
—Tojira, swamp queen

name: Angel of Fury
oracle_text: Flying
When Angel of Fury dies, you may shuffle it into its owner's library.

rulings.text: If Angel of Fury is removed from the graveyard after the ability triggers but before it resolves, it will remain in its zone when its owner shuffles their library. Similarly, if a replacement effect has it move to a different zone instead of being put into the graveyard, the ability won’t trigger at all.

Angel of Fury’s second ability is a leaves-the-battlefield ability. Because it works only from on the battlefield, it behaves differently than the _Lorwyn_ Incarnations. When Angel of Fury is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, it will look back in time (to the point just before it left the battlefield) to see if its ability triggers. That means the following: — If Angel of Fury lost its triggered ability while on the battlefield (due to Snakeform, for example) and then was destroyed, the ability would not trigger. Angel of Fury would stay in its owner’s graveyard. — If Angel of Fury had its triggered ability when it left the battlefield, but lost it when it was put into the graveyard (due to Yixlid Jailer, for example), the ability would still trigger. Angel of Fury would be shuffled into its owner’s library.

name: Angel of Mercy
oracle_text: Flying
When Angel of Mercy enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.

oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains flying until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

name: Angelic Wall
oracle_text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Flying
flavor_text: Be at peace, and observe its beauty. Be at war, and feel its justice.

name: Apprentice Sorcerer

flavor_text: War destroys more than just the land. War destroys hope.

oracle_text: Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn.

name: Breath of Life
oracle_text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

oracle_text: When Brutal Nightstalker enters the battlefield, you may have target opponent discard a card.

name: Chorus of Woe

name: Coastal Wizard
oracle_text: {T}: Return Coastal Wizard and another target creature to their owners' hands. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

rulings.text: If a turn has multiple combat phases, the ability can only be activated before the beginning of the declare attackers step of the first combat phase in that turn.

name: Coercion
oracle_text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a card from it. That player discards that card.

oracle_text: If Cunning Giant is unblocked, you may have it assign its combat damage to a creature defending player controls.

oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: The bat thrives on what underestimates it.

oracle_text: Dakmor Plague deals 3 damage to each creature and each player.
flavor_text: The tiniest cough can be deadlier than the fiercest dragon.

name: Dakmor Scorpion
flavor_text: A scorpion this big you won't find curled up in your boot. Maybe around your boot, but not in it.

name: Dakmor Sorceress
oracle_text: Dakmor Sorceress's power is equal to the number of Swamps you control.

name: Dark Offering
oracle_text: Destroy target nonblack creature. You gain 3 life.
flavor_text:
"Our greatest hope has become our enemy's greatest triumph."
—Restela, Alaborn marshal

name: Deathcoil Wurm
oracle_text: You may have Deathcoil Wurm assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.

rulings.text: You can decide to assign damage to the defending player or planeswalker even if the blocking creature has protection from green or damage preventing effects on it.

When assigning combat damage, you choose whether you want to assign all damage to blocking creatures, or if you want to assign all of it to the player or planeswalker this creature is attacking. You can’t split the damage assignment between them.
If blocked by a creature with banding, the defending player decides whether or not the damage is assigned “as though it weren’t blocked”.

name: Deep Wood
oracle_text: Cast this spell only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step.
Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you this turn by attacking creatures.

name: Déjà Vu
oracle_text: Return target sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: History is the study of repetition.

name: Denizen of the Deep
oracle_text: When Denizen of the Deep enters the battlefield, return each other creature you control to its owner's hand.

name: Earthquake
oracle_text: Earthquake deals X damage to each creature without flying and each player.

rulings.text: Whether or not a creature is without flying is only checked on resolution.

name: Exhaustion
oracle_text: Creatures and lands target opponent controls don't untap during their next untap step.

rulings.text: The creatures and lands are only prevented from untapping during the targeted player’s next untap step. They can still can untap during other player’s untap steps.
No creatures or lands controlled by the player will untap during their next untap step. This includes those which entered the battlefield after Exhaustion resolved.

name: Extinguish
oracle_text: Counter target sorcery spell.

oracle_text: Look at the top card of target player's library. You may put that card into their graveyard.

flavor_text: They get along so well with their goats because they're practically goats themselves.

oracle_text: Sacrifice Goblin Firestarter: It deals 1 damage to any target. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

flavor_text: Lead, follow, or run around like crazy.

oracle_text: Flying
Goblin Glider can't block.

name: Goblin Matron
oracle_text: When Goblin Matron enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Goblin card, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

rulings.text: Because the “search” requires you to find a card with certain characteristics, you don’t have to find the card if you don’t want to.

If an effect refers to a “[subtype] spell” or “[subtype] card,” it refers only to a spell or card that has that subtype. For example, Goblin War Party is a card that references and creates Goblins, but it isn’t a Goblin card.

name: Goblin Mountaineer
oracle_text: Mountainwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)

rulings.text: When the ability resolves, you choose whether to sacrifice the creature or perform the other action. If you can’t perform the other action, then you must sacrifice the creature.
If the creature is no longer on the battlefield when the ability resolves, you may still perform the action if you want.

oracle_text: Hurricane deals X damage to each creature with flying and each player.

rulings.text: You can decide to assign damage to the defending player or planeswalker even if the blocking creature has protection from green or damage preventing effects on it.

When assigning combat damage, you choose whether you want to assign all damage to blocking creatures, or if you want to assign all of it to the player or planeswalker this creature is attacking. You can’t split the damage assignment between them.
If blocked by a creature with banding, the defending player decides whether or not the damage is assigned “as though it weren’t blocked”.

rulings.text: Because the “search” requires you to find a card with certain characteristics, you don’t have to find the card if you don’t want to.

You can find any card with the land type Forest, including Snow-covered Forest or non-Basic lands like Tropical Island, Murmuring Bosk, or Stomping Ground. You can even find a card that is a land in addition to other types, such as Dryad Arbor.

name: Path of Peace
oracle_text: Destroy target creature. Its owner gains 4 life.
flavor_text:
"You could die famous or you could die old. I chose old."
—Former soldier

rulings.text: You are a creature’s owner if the card representing it began the game in your deck, or if it’s a token that entered the battlefield under your control. If Path of Peace targets a creature that you own but an opponent controls, you’ll gain 4 life.
If the target creature is an illegal target by the time Path of Peace tries to resolve, the spell doesn’t resolve. No player gains life.

name: Piracy
oracle_text: Until end of turn, you may tap lands you don't control for mana. Spend this mana only to cast spells.
flavor_text: The sea gives, and the sea takes. Some just help with the taking.

name: Rain of Daggers
oracle_text: Destroy all creatures target opponent controls. You lose 2 life for each creature destroyed this way.

name: Raise Dead
oracle_text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text:

—Tojira, swamp queen

rulings.text: You must show the card you bring out of the graveyard to your opponent.
The creature being brought back is chosen on announcement and not on resolution of the spell because it is targeted.

name: Rally the Troops
oracle_text: Cast this spell only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step.
Untap all creatures you control.

name: Ravenous Rats
oracle_text: When Ravenous Rats enters the battlefield, target opponent discards a card.

name: Razorclaw Bear
oracle_text: Whenever Razorclaw Bear becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
One razorclaw is three bears too many.
—Elvish saying

name: Relentless Assault
oracle_text: Untap all creatures that attacked this turn. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase.

rulings.text: If you manage to cast this during a main phase of your opponent’s turn, that opponent’s creatures will untap and that opponent will be able to attack again. It will not allow you to attack during their turn.
Abilities that trigger when a creature attacks, blocks, or is blocked will trigger during each combat that turn. Thus, a creature with Rampage will get the bonus added during each attack.
A creature that must attack each turn, must only attack once that turn. It is not forced into each attack that turn.
It only creates an additional combat and main phase if it resolves during a main phase.

name: Remove
oracle_text: Cast this spell only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step.
Return target attacking creature to its owner's hand.

name: Renewing Touch
oracle_text: Shuffle any number of target creature cards from your graveyard into your library.
flavor_text: Death just encourages life the more.

name: Return of the Nightstalkers
oracle_text: Return all Nightstalker permanent cards from your graveyard to the battlefield. Then destroy all Swamps you control.

name: Righteous Charge
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Bravery shines brightest in a pure soul."
—Restela, Alaborn marshal

rulings.text: Only creatures you control when Righteous Charge resolves will get +2/+2. Creatures that come under your control later in the turn will not.

name: Righteous Fury
oracle_text: Destroy all tapped creatures. You gain 2 life for each creature destroyed this way.

name: River Bear
oracle_text: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
flavor_text: The bears had been isolated on an island for hundreds of years, until the island sank and the bears didn't.

name: Salvage
oracle_text: Put target card from your graveyard on top of your library.
flavor_text:
"What was taken shall be restored."
—Arathel, elvish queen

name: Screeching Drake
oracle_text: Flying
When Screeching Drake enters the battlefield, draw a card, then discard a card.

name: Sea Drake
oracle_text: Flying
When Sea Drake enters the battlefield, return two target lands you control to their owner's hand.

rulings.text: When the ability resolves, if one of the lands has become an illegal target (because it’s no longer on the battlefield, for example), you return the other one to your hand. If both of the lands have become illegal targets, the ability doesn’t resolve. This has no effect on Sea Drake.

name: Sleight of Hand
oracle_text: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library.

rulings.text: If there is only one card in your library, you put it into your hand.

name: Spitting Earth
oracle_text: Spitting Earth deals damage to target creature equal to the number of Mountains you control.

name: Steam Catapult
oracle_text: {T}: Destroy target tapped creature. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

From time, knowledge.
From knowledge, power.

rulings.text: If a turn has multiple combat phases, the ability can only be activated before the beginning of the declare attackers step of the first combat phase in that turn.

name: Talas Scout
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text:
"Scouting a battle before you fight it is just good business."
—Jefan, Talas ship captain

name: Talas Warrior
oracle_text: Talas Warrior can't be blocked.
flavor_text: The sea is in their blood. Literally.

name: Temple Acolyte
oracle_text: When Temple Acolyte enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
flavor_text: Young, yes. Inexperienced, yes. Weak? Don't count on it.

name: Temple Elder
oracle_text: {T}: You gain 1 life. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.
flavor_text:
"Give us breath. Give us life. Prepare us for the day we make."
—The Alaborn "Rite of Battle"

rulings.text: If a turn has multiple combat phases, the ability can only be activated before the beginning of the declare attackers step of the first combat phase in that turn.

name: Temporal Manipulation
oracle_text: Take an extra turn after this one.
flavor_text: Doing something at the last minute isn't so bad when you can make that minute last.

rulings.text: If multiple “extra turn” effects resolve in the same turn, take them in the reverse of the order that the effects resolved.

name: Theft of Dreams
oracle_text: Draw a card for each tapped creature target opponent controls.
flavor_text: "First they fight, then they sleep, then they dream. And finally I receive my reward."

name: Tidal Surge
oracle_text: Tap up to three target creatures without flying.
flavor_text: Four little goblins, trapped by the sea. One teased a serpent, and then there were three.

flavor_text: "I don't want what I don't have. I want more of what I do have."

flavor_text: Battle tempers soldiers as fire tempers steel.

name: Undo
oracle_text: Return two target creatures to their owners' hands.

rulings.text: The two creatures may have different owners and return to their respective owner’s hands.

name: Untamed Wilds
oracle_text: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

rulings.text: Because the “search” requires you to find a card with certain characteristics, you don’t have to find the card if you don’t want to.

flavor_text: Two little goblins, out in the sun. Down came a griffin, and then there was one.

name: Wild Ox
oracle_text: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
flavor_text: It has the run of the swamps, and it knows it.

name: Wildfire
oracle_text: Each player sacrifices four lands. Wildfire deals 4 damage to each creature.

name: Wind Sail
oracle_text: One or two target creatures gain flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: It pays to be at home both on the sea and in the sky.
